title: Gravity Intro (Beginner)
intro: Gravity is like a magical force that pulls things towards each other. It keeps us on the ground and makes objects fall when we release them.
outro: Great job! You've learned the basic idea of gravity for beginners.

concepts.name: Gravity Basics
concepts.explain: Think of gravity as a giant magnet that pulls objects down. It holds us on the ground and causes things like apples to drop when we release them.
concepts.example: Picture a ball rolling down a hill. Gravity is like a gentle hand guiding the ball downward.

check.question: How can you describe gravity in simple terms?
